title: HoP 237 - Begin the Beguine - Hadewijch and Mechthild of Magdeburg
itunes:title: HoP 237 - Begin the Beguine - Hadewijch and Mechthild of Magdeburg
description: Two Beguine authors, Hadewijch and Mechthild of Magdeburg, deploy the tropes of courtly love in vernacular writings about their mystical experiences.
content:encoded: Two Beguine authors, Hadewijch and Mechthild of Magdeburg, deploy the tropes of courtly love in vernacular writings about their mystical experiences.
